info.title: External API
info.description:
## Date type fields
API endpoints expected date in UTC±0:00 timezone. Timezones in ISO8601 format will be ignored. API endpoints support date in two formats (one of): ISO8601 ('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SSZ') or Unix Timestamp (seconds count since January 1st, 1970 at UTC).

## Dropdown fields
Some fields are configured as dropdown fields with a dedicated list of values within Oomnitza. You can review the list of available dropdown values within the customization page in Oomnitza. In case you want to be able to post any data into these fields, you should switch them to dropdown without value within the customization page.

get.description: Get Users list assigned to the SaaS
Get Users list assigned to the SaaS

post.description: Bulk assign Users to the SaaS
Store user_external_id of user in external saas system

delete.description: Delete SaaS Role and Users relations

post.description: Assign Users to the SaaS Roles

patch.description: Assign users to the SaaS Roles. Overwrites the current list of the User's roles in this certain SaaS. If new Role values come in the list than new SaaSRole records will be created.

delete.description: Unassign users from the SaaS Roles

get.description: Get run logs list for particular connector.
Get details of particular portion of connector run logs.

errors.description: Error messages if any. Null if no error happened

200.description: Run logs list for particular connector.
Details of particular portion of connector run logs.

text.name: text
text.description: Regular API v3 full text search expression

ignore_meta_restriction.name: Oomnitza-Ignore-Meta-Restriction
ignore_meta_restriction.description: Used to allow the non-system edit-only field to be updated. Allowed values: 0, 1

alternative_id.name: alternative_id
alternative_id.description: The name of the alternative unique field

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Filter by roles. Exclude users where there are no common roles in the list of required roles and list of user roles
